Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, south of the Obidian Housing Complex.
Room.LongDescription: Due to the lack of space within the City Walls, Oceancrest cannot support the building of individual home within the limits of the city. However, since there is a need for people to live inside the city, large housing complexes like the Obidian Community Housing Complex have been built.
